g_odvw_0::intro_card_0::headline: What do you hope to learn?
g_odvw_0::clip_card_0::goals[0]: Ask: What do you hope to learn about making videos?
g_odvw_0::text_card_4::text: Trim by tapping the clip image.
g_odvw_0::text_card_1::text: Ask your partner, "What do you hope to learn about making videos?"
g_odvw_0::text_card_6::text: Don't worry, all clips are saved in your gallery.
g_odvw_0::text_card_3::text: If there is a lot of background noise, find a new location.
g_odvw_0::text_card_5::text: If you recorded multiple clips, delete all but your chosen clip before you publish.
g_odvw_0::title: What do you hope to learn?
g_odvw_0::text_card_0::text: Each with your own phones, first interview your partner, and then your partner will interview you.
g_odvw_0::text_card_2::text: Make sure you are close enough to hear your partner.
